law.catch_line: Judgments against Commonwealth up to $500,000 deemed necessary governmental expense.
law.text: The first five hundred thousand dollars ($500,000) of any Kentucky court judgment against the Commonwealth awarding damages on a contract claim under the provisions of KRS 45A.240 to 45A.270 shall be a necessary governmental expense and payment shall be approved by the Finance and Administration Cabinet and paid by the State Treasurer. Appropriations for these judgments shall be continued appropriations.
law.history: Amended and reenacted as KRS 45A.275, 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 55, effective January 1, 1979. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 181, sec. 7.
